keyword: how many calories in a chipotle chicken bowl
title: How Many Calories in a Chipotle Chicken Bowl?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a chipotle chicken bowl, including macros like protein and carbs, plus tweaks and FAQs for customizations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chipotle Chicken Bowl?
assumptions: Standard Chipotle burrito bowl: grilled adobo chicken, brown rice, black beans, fajita veggies, fresh tomato salsa, cheese, romaine lettuce; no guacamole or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, customizations, and preparation. Values based on Chipotle's standard estimates; check app or labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle chicken bowl has about 680 kcal and 45 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chipotle chicken bowl without rice?
faqs.a: About 470 kcal, subtracting the 210 kcal from brown rice.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chipotle chicken bowl?
faqs.a: Approximately 45 g, mostly from the grilled chicken.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Chipotle chicken bowl?
faqs.a: Around 1500 mg, due to seasonings and beans.

faqs.q: Does adding guac change calories in a chipotle chicken bowl much?
faqs.a: Yes, it adds about 230 kcal for a standard scoop.

faqs.q: Are Chipotle chicken bowls low carb?
faqs.a: Moderately; standard has 70 g carbs, but skipping rice reduces to ~40 g.
